displayname: Willem van der Velde the Elder
alphasort: Velde, Willem van der the Elder
biography: He was famed for depicting ships and small craft, and history scenes, such as battles at sea. He was often at sea with the Dutch fleet and he witnessed several battles first hand. His work was popular in England. Comment on works: Sea pieces Comment on works: Landscapes; Marines.

altnames.displayname: Willem van der Velde the Elder
altnames.alphasort: Velde, Willem van der the Elder
